https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/d9MfxX2eHRBI3c7XZSMfYI0bTYg.jpg Elias is a handsome young deputy manager in a garment factory in São Paulo. When he’s not working, he enjoys casual encounters in the big city. The arrival of a young African, Fernando, on the production line piques his interest and Elias finds himself increasingly drawn into socialising with his work colleagues. Body Electric
